review_data.title: More than just Drinks
review_data.content: Cool atmosphere, very attentive & helpful team, everyone, many thanks especially to Sahaf. Def Must Visit in Zurich 👌❤️

review_data.title: Oase mitten in der Stadt

review_data.title: Hidden Jen for warm months
review_data.content: Rimini is a super scenic bar standing on a little river. In the evening the atmosphere is simply magical and the place is usually very crowded, but always enjoyable. Just don't expect too much from their pizzas!

review_data.title: Super atmosphere in a hidden gem
review_data.content: I spent here fantastic nights. The bar is just on the river and has some gorgeous little pools. Special illumination.High recommended

review_data.title: Great place

review_data.title: Great location
review_data.content: Great location, fast drink service, friendly staff. Some food but taking some time to make when place crowded. It’s self-service so firstly bring a mate to reserve you a space plus you don’t have to wait for a waiter. Better also eat before. Toilets OK.

review_data.title: Cool outdoor bar

review_data.title: Summer in Zurich

review_data.title: Very nice bar!!
review_data.content: Rimini is a very nice self service for young people!! The place is amazing, it is like an oasis in the middle of the town. The pool in the middle makes you feel like you are on an island. Nice decoration, delicious cocktails and pizza!!

review_data.title: Escape the city!
review_data.content: A beautiful bar hidden away on the water. A great place to get together with friends and enjoy some drinks and pizza together. The atmosphere is almost unbeatable on those hot summer nights in Zürich!

review_data.title: cheese fondue in October

review_data.title: Drinks in the sunshine
review_data.content: During the day it's a men only swimming area which turns into lovely bar in the evening. It's packed during summer with an interesting and diverse crowd of bankers and students alike. One of the best places to have a drink in Zurich!

review_data.title: Hidden Gem

review_data.title: Great place for an afterwork drink!

review_data.title: Perfect place for afterwork...

review_data.title: One of the best cheese fondue in Zurich in the season
review_data.content: One of the best cheese fondue in Zurich, only serve that in the winter season. Went last year, the ambiance of sitting outside is really great. Service is (a little bit too) informal and relaxt, but food and unique setting make it worth a visit.

review_data.title: Awesome vibe!

review_data.title: Great location for a drink in the evening

review_data.title: Location and service are great!
review_data.content: I went for drinks....and stayed until end of the evening. The location is very nice, beers and pizza are great. It opens at 1915.... So don't get there too early. Service at the bar is nice and fun.

review_data.title: Worth it just for the location
